DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison two technique endotracheal intubation ( Glidescope versus Macintosh ) patient odontogenic abscess .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients odontogenic abcesses treat surgical drainage abscess general intubation endotracheal intubation . Because limited mouth open swell within oral cavity , intubation difficult sometimes impossible conventional direct laryngoscopy . Therefore , alternative technique desirable . We want compare success rate intubation patient use Glidescope technique vs. conventional Macintosh technique .
DOC.criteria: Patients abscess treat surgically . Mouth opening ( Interincisor gap ) less 3.5 cm 1.4 cm . Age 18 year .
